definition: Facilitating peer connections, collaboration, and sense of belonging in learning communities

positive_examples: Let's pair you with someone who recently mastered this concept.
You're not alone in finding this challenging - many students struggle here.
Working with a study partner can help you both understand the material better.
The learning community provides support that extends beyond one-on-one tutoring.
negative_examples: Don't talk to other students - this is individual work.
Comparing yourself to others is pointless.
training_hints.disambiguation: Building connections and community, not isolation
